Reviews.Content: hotel date noise level street activity unacceptable couldnt close bedroom window youd air ac living booked easily slept 6 reserved 4 arrived charged extra 25 night teenagers sent towels pillows blankets day drive quebec city forethought night broken sleep checked instead returning slept car road
